meanings.definition: Not hard or firm to the touch
meanings.sent1: The pillow was very softs and comfortable to rest on.

meanings.sent3: The softs clouds seemed to be made of cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as softs as a whisper in the wind.
